Class AbstractChart.ChartRunnableWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.AbstractChart.ChartRunnableWrapper

    Enclosing class:
    AbstractChart

    private static final class AbstractChart.ChartRunnableWrapper
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Wrapper of a ChartTimerTask in order to to be added to a CTimer.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
